steps.title: Empty 1 or 2 trays of ice into a large bowl.
steps.content: Empty 1 or 2 trays of ice into a large bowl.

steps.title: Put lettuce (washed or not) into the bowl.
steps.content: Put lettuce (washed or not) into the bowl. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fill the bowl with cold water, keeping the lettuce as fully submerged as possible.
steps.content: Fill the bowl with cold water, keeping the lettuce as fully submerged as possible. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Remove the lettuce from the water and dry it in a salad spinner.
steps.content: Remove the lettuce from the water and dry it in a salad spinner.

steps.title: Make salad and serve immediately.
steps.content: Make salad and serve immediately. [4] X Research source
